text: @piersmorgan Piers, Covid19 is Toxic, not brexit, and to call brexit toxic in comparison to coronavirus is a disgrace and deeply offensive.  Why don't you #AskChina serious questions, why don't you criticise them? Go after the driver, not the victims. Our govt didn't cause crisis, China did.
